reviews.review:
Since The Plague update, infinite loading screens and player DCs (both intentional and unintentional) ran rampant, but the devs have taken active steps to find workarounds and make changes to these arguably game-breaking bugs.

This has been the multiplayer game that I have played the most and loved the longest, and 2019 has been the year of dev communication. I'm impressed with the amount of planned changes and how quickly patches have rolled out for bugfixes, etc. lately.

My only wish is that the element of horror that makes this game so fun in the very beginning still remained as someone who's been playing this game for a cumulative 500 hours (if you count my time playing on XBox).

Thrilling and suspenseful game. Get chased and killed (if you're not good enough lol) by the scary movie legends as you work as a team with other online players. Or you can be the legend and kill the players!! Pretty good graphics. Not a bad price for the game. Especially if you get it on sale. It gets repetitive after a while but is still fun to continue playing. If you like a thrill then this game will be good for you.
гуд советую купить

Look, the game is fun, but it can also be rather frustrating. I recommend heading to the discussions forum and getting a feel for what's going on in-game. You may also want to look up some gameplay videos/

You should play it with some friends, but there are Killer(s) that will dodge your for playing "Survive With Friends" (SWF). So, expect some "you've been disconnected from the host" errors.  For the moment, the "Killer" is the host of the match.; make sure you have a decent ping in the lobby, or else you'll have a real bad time.

Survivors have one major goal; to survive. To survive is to leave without being murdered. Just in case you didn't know - people die when they are killed.

Primary objective: Repair up to 5 Generators
Secondary objective: Power an Exit Gate (after generators are repaired)
Optional objective(s): Destroy dull or hex totems and/or loot item(s) from chests

Like any game, this takes some serious playtime to get use to the mechanics, and experience + knowledge of the perks and strategies will help you survive some of the shenanigans that go on. The first strategy you should implement is creating a macro for the two stages of struggling, because mashing keys on your keyboard gets old real fast. 

When a killer downs you, he has to pick you up and carry you to a hook. During this time you can struggle (cycle A <-> D), and if the killer spends too much time taking you to a hook you might get free. When you're hooked, which you will be, you have a few attempts to unhook yourself - do not do this. There is a base chance (4%) you can successfully unhook yourself. All failed attempts decreases your time left and teamates will probably think you're trying to suicide (they will hate you for it).

If you've been hooked before, or left on the hook for too long,  you will have another chance to struggle (mash SPACE until there is a hole in your desk) to delay your death for someone to maybe rescue you. If you are rescued during struggle phase, then getting hooked again is an instant death.

When you're starting out I can really only recommend trying to make a goal for yourself, like trying to hide from the killer as long as you can, maybe do a whole generator yourself, or destroy some totems. Some good starting characters are Claudette and Nea. Claudette can heal herself when injured, and her other two perks help you find injured allies and heal them faster. Nea's strongest perk allows you move faster while crouching. She has another that reduces the consumption rate on items for you and nearby survivors, while the last perk is more situational. Chances are you'll just pick Meg and run around the map like a lunatic. Perks can be shared later on, so choose your first survivor wisely. Each will have something extremely useful and you'll want to level them all!

By the way, don't play Laurie from the halloween DLC and/or use Decisive Strike perk - killers will hate you for it and murder you first with impunity.

Aunque al principio temia por mi corazoncito, me di cuenta que en realidad no es tan sangriento ni aterrador (Y doy muchas gracias por ello) 
Lo conoci gracias a un amigo, y lo ame por sus encantadores personajes. Todos, tanto Supervivientes como Asesinos, tienes una personalidad unica, eso adoro en los videojuegos, se siente como si con cada sonido que hacen o cada habilidad que usan, te vas uniendo más a ellos... o temiendoles más si son asesinos, claro.
He probado ambos modos que ofrece el juego, como superviviente, he sufrido, sobretodo cuando estaba aprendiendo pero es muy adictivo. Te obliga a mejorar y te va enganchando con cada partida, vas coleccionando puntos que se canjean por Habilidades para el personaje a tu eleccion, dandole accesorios y habilidades nuevas. El juego en verdad tiene más contenido de lo que sospechaba por su precio. Me ha dado una sorpresa en verdad maravillosa, suelo jugarlo seguido y me he divertido mucho.
Las cosas más destacables que le veo son las siguientes:

+ Variedad aceptable de personajes (En ambos casos)

+ Cada partida es diferente, no solo por el mapa, sino por el estilo que tendra cada jugador, el objeto que lleve o el personaje que utilice.

+ Divertido, es sencillo aprenderlo y tiene un tutorial bastante curioso. Te explica detalladamente como hacer y para que hacer cada accion. Sin embargo, es complejo de dominar y requiere tiempo.

+ Al menos, yo no siento que sea Pay to Win. Puedes invertir dinero real, pero solo sirve para comprar personajes nuevos, algun Dlc o puntos especiales (que compran cosas esteticas)

+ Se que no se le suele prestar atencion a los sonidos, pero, en verdad estan muy bien logrados. Puedes simplemente escuchar la respiracion agitada de un superviviente, sentir los pasos del asesino, percibir como suena el pasto al moverse o el caracteristico ruido de un generador siendo reparado. Sin contar la maravillosa banda sonora que tiene. (La musica de persecucion es mi favorita, sin ninguna duda)

+ A simple vista es facil reconocer cada cosa, es muy intuitivo.

Hay varias cosas más pero no quisiera alargar todavia más esto.
Por supuesto... no todo puede ser bonito, no quisiera ser arbitrario.

-Tiene bastantes bugs. (Si bien la mayoria son graciosos, no lo voy a negar, estoy seguro que si me sucedieran a mi no pensaria en sonreir...)

-A veces el emparejamiento da más miedo que el juego en si, Tu cuenta esta dividida por 2 rangos. Por ejemplo, yo puedo ser un superviviente Rango 1 pero como Asesino seguir siendo Rango 20 (El más bajo). Bien, ya con esto ejemplificado, puedes imaginar los destrozoso de un asesino rango 10 a unos pobres novatos 19 por ejemplo. Parece poca diferencia, pero es más experiencia de lo que se puede ver en estos numeros.

-Tiene más bugs. Hasta esta reseña seguro se buguea tambien ya de paso.

-Puede ser Frustrante a veces, algunos compañeros de equipo juegan muy en solitario cuando eres superviviente, y no dudan en abandonarte si aseguran su propio escape. Tambien, hay asesinos que solo tienen ojos para una persona hasta que la dejan fuera de la partida, o no tienen prisa en esperar pacientemente a tu lado mientras estas llorando en un gancho. 

-El azar del juego puede jugarte mala pasada, tanto si eres asesino como superviviente. Por ejemplo, salir un mapa que odies, o que los ultimos 2 generadores esten muy cercanos y sea dificil repararlos sin alertar al asesino. Las puertas de salida esten muy juntas en el mapa y esten vigiladas muy facil, o por el contrario, si eres el asesino... seguro que las puertas de salida estaran 1 a cada punta del mapa.

Bien, no quisiera sobrecargar en exceso esto, pero, en verdad hay tanto que pudiera escribir y me siento muy inspirado al hablar de este juego. No crei que me gustara tanto, muchas gracias, si leiste todo esto, te dejo un gran abrazo y espero le puedas dar una oportunidad a este juego.
Lo calificaria como un 7/10. Dado que por lo explicado anteriormente, dista de ser perfecto, pero tiene demasiado positivo como para calificarlo como malo.

-Ney.
打折肯定不亏，游戏是好游戏，就是有的时候会有些可笑的bug，但是还是很好玩的，至少低段位是，开黑还是单人都蛮不错的，就是感觉人类被砍的有点惨，可能是段位太低了8。

HOLA... me compre el juego como hace 3 semanas y al momento de comenzar a jugar el juego se me cierra, llega a una determinada pantalla de carga que esta se vuelve lenta y colapsa y se cierra el juego, se cierra aproximadamente cuando el juego te pide presione cualquier tecla para continuar. 
sI me dieran alguna respuesta acerca de por que le sucede esto a mi juego se le agradece, de ante mano muchas gracias.
游戏非常好玩，玩家非常友好^_^

Ignore anyone's review with anything less than 500 hours, they most likely don't know how to play survivor or killer correctly. This game has an extremely high skill cap, and not being skilled at it will yield an annoying experience as you'll go down a lot as survivor, or not get kills often as killer. With that said, here it goes.

First I've met one of my best friends through this game as well as countless other good friends I still talk to and I wouldn't trade that for anything. This game has yielded great experiences, from when I first played survivor, crouching around the map, to recent days of running from and messing with the killer. I should say I play killer/survivor with a 50/50 split, I've achieved rank 1  with killer and survivor multiple times, but you're most memorable times will probably come from playing survivor. Anyways this game has been a blast, a truly fun experience learning how to run from the killer, or learning how to mind-game survivors AS the killer. With a decent Twitch community behind it, there's always something new to watch or learn about the game. But I can't in good faith recommend this game and it really hurts to say that.

The main problem with this game is you aren't rewarded for ranking up, there are no rewards for your work, you're actually penalized. As you rank up this game becomes much more toxic. Survivors and killers both because of their high rank will feel entitled to the win. Survivors will t-bag and troll you, and make sure you know in post-game chat their opinion of whether you should be toaster-bathing yourself or not. And if you become a good survivor, it makes a lot of killers mad. "Oh you ran me for 3 gens, that's an automatic facecamp" (facecamp is when the killer hooks the survivor and doesn't leave them to make SURE they die) and yes that's an actual quote said to me. Which makes you de-pip (partial de-rank). Which is another thing, the ranks.

Every game is ranked whether you like it or not and if ranking up is your main goal prepare to be disappointed. If the killer disconnects you de-pip. Load in the game and one of the survivors didn't load in and its a 1v3? Probably a de-pip. Made the killer mad somehow and now he's facecamping you? De-pip. Double-pip is extremely hard nowadays. You have to do pretty much everything to do so, so most games will be just a normal pip. But that game where you pipped that took 20 minutes, well next game you got found first and hooked and as soon as you were unhooked the killer tunnels you immediately and downs and hooks you again, so back down your rank goes. Rinse and repeat. I guess what i'm trying to say each game is a coin flip of it'll be a toxic waste of time, or an actual enjoyable game.

The MAIN problem in this game is one you won't face unless you get to rank 1, which is that at the core of the game survivors control the game and are much stronger than the killer. The time it takes to down one good survivor, 3 or 4 gens will be done, and extend that time depending on if they have decisive strike or not, which essentially is a get out of jail free card. But like i said, that's only with good, optimal-playing survivors. So now that I've talked about the game play let's talk about the stability of the game, and it's developers.

Bad. Real bad. Constant survivor DC's when game starts, loading screens getting stuck, you name it. And every time the game fails to load you lose your offering. That's right. Even if you don't actually load in the game, your offering still gets used up. Sucks for you I guess! Also I don't exaggerate when I say with every patch or DLC release a slew of bugs come with it. I don't know whats up with this game's code, but every time they tweak something it opens the flood gates to bugs. The devs hardly seem to listen as well. People have been asking to buff Freddy since he was released, still nothing. People have been complaining about Decisive strike being too strong, nothing. They said those 2 things are both in the works, but does it really take over a year to hear your loyal players out? 

I guess they have their development road map is top dog , and well-thought out criticism can take a back seat. One time when the game's lead designer was asked in a QnA about what to do when killer gets too frustrating because it's so stacked against the killer at times, making it literally impossible to win, he said to go play Civ 5. I'm not kidding. The devs just see us as crying kids, not happy that the game isn't perfect, but we don't want it perfect, we've played the hell out of it, we love it, we want it to be better and it could be. And it's a shame it isn't because I love this game. But it's a buggy, unbalanced, unrewarding grind (which is another topic by itself, i'm talking 300 hours or so to get all the perks on everyone WITHOUT prestiging) and it's just not worth it. I don't regret the time I put into this game, but it's not something I can recommend. I know the market is a bit short of multiplayer horror games, but this is less horror and more a game of toxic, bug-ridden tag. It hurts to say, but don't waste your time.
Рееедко, но можно кайфануть здесь хорошенько)

Juego de mierda, donde los creadores piensan en sacar skins mientras no tienen ni servidores propios. Los asesinos son los que hostean la partida y ellos deciden si tenés lag o no. Además de que juegan para el ojete ambos bandos: asesinos que campean y tunelean a más no poder y survivors que rushean motores como si no hubiera un mañana. Otros también boludean a los asesinos porque "es un modo de jugar". En fin, comunidades tóxicas si las hay...

No recomendado.

Great game! LOVE playing killer, but survivors tend to be wayyy to salty. They have many advantages over the killer and if you kill them they diss you and what not, but hey, what can ya do? You can also play with your friends to raise up the fun, although you need to be very calm because you can get angry realy quick. Over all it is worth purchasing it..

Os sobreviventes podem ficar com seus estatos, mas ainda sim, estao muito altos, por isso os assassinos precisão de uma vantagem de pontos maior(so para o proximo evento).

Dobra gra dla osób lubujących się w kinie klasy B, ale nie tylko. Dead By Daylight (w skrócie DBD) to asymetryczna gra multiplayer (Asymetryczna znaczy, że jest nie do końca sprawiedliwa - jedna drużyna jest teoretycznie silniejsza od drugiej), w którą możemy zagrać jako morderca i jako ocalały próbujący uciec z mapy. Całość jest pokryta zadawalającymi teksturami i całkiem niezłą muzyką. Podsumowując DBD to gra trudna, ale wciągająca i uzależniająca. 

Ocena: 8/10 gdzie:
1 - Okropna
2- Zła
3 - Niezadowalająca 
4 - Poniżej przeciętnej 
5 - Przeciętna
6 - Zadowalająca 
7 - Dobra 
8 - Bardzo Dobra
9 - Wyśmienita
10 - Arcydzieło

Overall the game can be stressful but i think that's what the devs wanted out of it.
Looking forward to the dedicated servers as hopefully they will take away a lot of the current downfalls of the game.
However the prices for all the dlcs is a bit much and locks a lot of the better perks behind a pay wall I think the game would benefit if they were knocked down too £3 permanently. I am aware if you put in the time you can get the characters for free which I think is a great idea.

Dead by Daylight- уникальная и затягивающая игра в своём роде. Сообщество игры очень разнообразно. Геймплэй уникальный и единственный в своём роде(не считая мобильных клонов),чрезвычайно разнообразный. Советую к покупке!

Arkadaşlar oyun mükemmel arkadaşlarınızla birlikte eğer sisteminiz düşükse ve oyun launcherdan sonra kapanıyorsa sürekli alt+enter spamlayın böylece tam ekran boyutundan çıkıcaktır ve oyun açılıcaktır bu sorunu uzun süredir bulamıyordum bir tane arkadaşımın sayesinde buldum alt+enter abanın beyler launcherdayken oyun. Arkadaşlar eğer oyunda fps sıkıntıları çekiyorsanız bana ulaşmak için profilime yorum atmanız yeterlidir. Başta katile hemen ölebilirsiniz fakat ilerledikçe pro olucaksınız alışcaksınız yerleri fln ezberliyiceksiniz aşırı zevkli oluyor oyunu bildiğinde 200 saat sonra oyunun kitabını yazdım İyi oyunlar :)

Игра для тех кто пережил все серии дарк солса и наигравшего в доту 1000+ часов, ибо такую игру можно лишь купить вашему заклятому врагу. Пока нет достойных конкурентов, она будет являться топ 1 среди прочих подобных проектов.
Что по игре, здесь вас ожидают: лаги при мощном железе, баги (МНОГО!), крайне токсичное комьюнити, расинхроны, вылеты.
Однозначно хороший проект для дружеского замеса, но не в одиночку, ибо игра станет крайне быстро унылой.
...I think we've done a pretty good job...

2019年11月4日：
段位机制没有反馈，只会碰到更强的对手，为什么不能学学炉石，每月按段位送一些血点呢？
人屠上一段拿了成就之后完全不在意段位了，沉迷黄绿段和萌新玩耍。
游戏中有守尸怪也有好哥哥，每次被放掉了都会加一手好友，嘿嘿。
————
军团的改动真的是屎


2021年2月12日：
过了几年终于知道按段位送血点了，但新的ui跟屎一样，明明游戏内容不需要调整，各种暗改就是要恶心玩家。
处决废了，人物军训站姿就不说了，esc切换修机没了，还没办法触发挂机屠夫的追逐了，这些改动是真你妈的恶心。
游戏是个好游戏，但碰上了傻逼制作组，真你妈的傻逼！



2022年2月12日：
过了一年终于可以切换修机了，难以置信的是，这居然是这款游戏五周年才实装的功能。

回头看爷的评测就没一条不准的，19年说段位送血点后面知道送了，21年说切换修机后面知道改了，是个明眼人都看的出来的问题你制作组就是不改，纯纯的大牛马。

可取之处也是有的，比如说通行证无限续杯。爷已经白嫖了九张裂隙，并且还要继续白嫖下去。感觉其他游戏很少能无限续杯的，zzz马+1。

希望有朝一日能看到属于杀机的正式比赛，哪怕不是大型赛事你官方牵头组织一场也好，现在虽然有一些，不过都是民间自发组织的，性质是不一样的。

什么时候能把无充能护士or斜眼流军团or一挂处决or挂机屠夫的追逐改回来，我什么时候改成好评。

很喜欢这款游戏，游戏做的也很公平，可玩性还可以，最好多出个模式，守尸惩罚也再高点，不然很多屠夫玩家既是节奏好也喜欢守尸，人类体验很差，还有那种把钩子上的队友当刷分工具的人也设置个惩罚，某些地图其实官方可以再改一改，比如掩护林和家宅，太多的死亡板和草原了QAQ，还希望官方可以出一个创意工坊，让玩家自制地图，可玩性就可以提高很多
I like this game very much. It's fair and playable. It's better to have more modes and corpse guarding punishment. Otherwise, many killer players like corpse guarding as well as good rhythm. The human experience is very bad. There are also people who use their teammates on hooks as scoring tools to set a penalty. Some maps can be changed officially, such as sheltering forests and houses. Too many death boards and grasslands QAQ, but also hope that the official can come up with a creative workshop, so that players can make their own maps, playability can be improved a lot.
I think we did a pretty good... JOB so far

[h1] 데드바이데이라이트 (월광사)  [/h1]
 입니다.

미국 슬래셔 무비를 연상 하는 살인마들과 영화에 나올듯한 비주얼의 살인마들

그리고 왜 캠핑하러 쳐온 정체불명의 생존자들 

스토리상으로 엔티티라는 악마에게 공포와 희망이라는 에너지로 인류에게 공포를 심을려고하는 대악마 엔티티의 계략이 숨어져있고

살인마는 엔티티에 납치되어 각종고문으로 정신개조를 당하고 살인마는 원망과분노 그리고 복종으로 엔티티의 명령에 따르며 영혼을 모아다니는 이야기입니다
이 이야기만 들으면 생존자가 참 불쌍해보이지만

현실은 
데바데는 착한 살인마들이 나쁜 악마(생존마) 4마리를 성불시키는 게임입니다.

고인물 살인마는 혼자서 싸워야하지만 고인물생존자(생존마) 4명은 혼자서 싸워야하는 혈압걸려 뒤지게만드는 매우 악마같고 짜증나고 한국교육의 현실 이하 왕따를 잘보여주는 최고의 경험게임입니다

정리:생존자 인싸,살인마 아싸
살인마 혼자서 싸워야함 생존마 4명에서 살인마를 혈압걸려 뒤지게만든다 그래서 생존마다.

이 리뷰는 랭크를 올라가면 올라갈수록 느끼게됩니다.

[spoiler] (이 리뷰기준은 모크 본인의 기준이며 이렇게 정리합니다 10랭크이하 (나쁜살인마들이 착한생존자 잡아죽이는게임) 10~5랭크 (나쁜살인마들이 생존마잡는게임) 5~이상 (생존마4명이 살인마 왕따시키는게임)﻿ [/spoiler]


※이 게임은 고인물 아니 썩은물 아니 석유가 넘쳐흐르는 산유국의 세계입니다.
Can't start a single game as a killer. Waited for a few tens of minutes but nothing. This game really needs an option for server region selection.

Наиграв в Dead By Daylight более тысячи часов, хочу сказать, что это, несмотря на неоднозначные мнения других людей, весёлая и просто забавная игра. Dead By Daylight позиционируется как хоррор, но на деле, наиграв в неё чуть больше 20 часов, таковой быть перестаёт. В Dead By Daylight особенно интересно проводить время с друзьями, жаловаться на кемперство и туннелерство, хотя, казалось бы, ты всего лишь бегаешь от маньяка парочку генераторов :D
А убивать токсиков - это отдельный вид искусства, который порой приносит удовольствие. Смотреть на их нытью в конце катки - бесценно. Аналогично гореть на рандомов, играя в соло за выживших, но, не смотря ни на что - я отношусь к игре с весельем :) 
Да коммьюнити Dead By Daylight ужасно. Настолько токсичных игроков я не видел ни в одной игре. Техническое состояние игры так же остаёт желать лучшего, по меркам на 2021 год. Порой приходит мысль, что игра находится в каком-нибудь альфа или бета тесте, но нет, это суровая виртуальная реальность Dead By Daylight.
В целом, дело ваше, покупать сиё чудо или нет, но моё мнение об данном продукте остаётся положительным, несмотря на её недостатки и минусы, я верю в светлое будущее этой игры.

Um joguinho baseado nos clichê dos filmes de terror, onde o objetivo é escapar do assassino (Hum, é mesmo?). Você pode jogar tanto como um [strike] brasileiro na raça [/strike] sobrevivente ou um [strike] protegido dos direitos humanos [/strike] assassino, Hu3. É um jogo de trabalho em equipe (na teoria, né.) de 4vs1. Para fugir você precisa ligar 5 geradores, espalhados pelo mapa, mas por sorte todos os sobreviventes são formados em engenharia mecânica, e concertam os geradores apenas ACARICIANDO as máquinas. Quando forem ligados os cinco, dois painéis elétricos ficaram disponíveis para abrirem os portões (custava nada por um portão com chave, né?)  Enquanto isso o assassino deve capturar os [strike] noobs [/strike] sobreviventes e deve levar para os ganchos de açougueiro satânicos de invocação da entidade de REGINA CASÉ, dai nesse momento você, SIM, VOCÊ! UM SOBREVIVENTE AMIGO! deveria ir lá salvar o [strike] idiota [/strike] coleguinha, mas certamente não vai, pois o abutre estará lá camperando. Então você como o resto do time nem vai ligar pro indivíduo que está lá pegando tétano, pelo contrário, vão achar isso ótimo, pois vão ligar os geradores e depois roubar os itens do coleguinha morto. É uma bela oportunidade, perca a amizade mas leve consigo essa bela lanterna pra cegar um assassino de máscara (sim, isso é possível.)  Pra escapar da perseguição de Regina Casé, digo, do monstro, você pode usar tábuas, posicionadas por sabe se lá quem, pelo mapa, que ao caírem próximas dará um retardo mental (mais do que ele já possui :v) nesse momento seria a oportunidade de pegar a tábua e bater nele até o olho saltar pra fora, quebrar as pernas e os braços, TACAR O TERROR GERAL! Não, estou apenas brincando, você sabe que todo sobrevivente é burro, sabem apenas correr e gritar (mas esses são formados em engenharia mecânica, não se esqueça!) Caso os três sobreviventes [strike] sejam noobs o suficiente pra [/strike] morrerem antes de ligar os cinco geradores, o último sobrevivente [strike] caso não tenha dado rage quit [/strike] tem uma chance de escapar, se tiverem sido ligados dois geradores, uma tampa de esgoto um alçapão aleatório vai abrir magicamente no mapa, e o jogo vai reconhecer como uma vitória mesmo que você vá lá rastejando igual uma lagarta leprosa depois de tanto apanhar para o assassino. Jogando de assassino, tu consegue ver os rastros dos sobreviventes, que por algum motivo menstruam (?) quando correm, deixando seu rastro vermelho no mapa. De sobrevivente, você resgata os outros, cura os outros, faz merd e fode os outros, pois vocês podem gritar quando estão sendo curados atraindo o assassino, pode sabotar os ganchos do assassino, mas se errar atraí o assassino, errar o gerador também ATRAÍ O ASSASSINO. Ai você pode descontar o ódio destruindo os tributos a Regina Casé pelo mapa. E você também pode ser um corvo, mentira, ninguém pode nem iria querer ser um corvo. Esses grandes FDP's x9 do caraleo. Se você correr e eles estiverem ali eles irão gritar e atrair a atenção do assassino, se você estiver escondido por um certo tempo, eles irão voar ao seu lado atraindo a atenção do assassino, se você estiver passando perto desses ku, e o assassino tiver uma habilidade que lhe permite ouvir os sons desses ku, eles irão atrair o assassino. Moral da história: nunca de pipoca aos corvos eles são os verdadeiros monstros desse jogo.

идеально воссоздает кульминацию почти любого слэшера: когда сценами обильного кровопускания зрителей уже развлекли и дело идет к развязке. Выжившие герои нашли путь к спасению. Они уже знают, что именно нужно сделать, чтобы ускользнуть от маньяка и вернуться домой, сохранив все конечности. Но безжалостный убийца идет по пятам. Все решают минуты. История вот-вот закончится. Зрители замерли в напряжении.

Именно эти ощущения игра передает в точности, да еще и позволяет взглянуть на ситуацию с другого ракурса — от лица убийцы. И все бы хорошо, только вот развеивается «магия» очень быстро.

Сочно вонзив мачете в плоть жертвы, маньяк обязательно остановится и вытрет инструмент о рукав, давая раненому герою небольшую фору. К тому же одного удара всегда мало. Убийца очень медленно протискивается в оконные проемы и долго разламывает сооруженные выжившими препятствия — чтобы жертва получила еще один шанс и игра в кошки-мышки растянулась.

Странное дело, но это даже не раздражает — условности формируют атмосферу, почти создают на наших глазах фильм ужасов. Туповатый, но увлекательный. Вся игра выстроена так, что ты собственными действиями невольно воссоздаешь знакомые с детства штампы.

This game never gets old. Seriously, being chase around by killers and seeing them fail to catch me is probably the best thing I got to do. They would chase me around and around until I escaped. I like the idea of making people grind to buy items because you don't necessarily have to pay for it. Even DLCs, you don't even need to buy them, you just have to keep playing to get them. That's where I like about this game. The game seems mostly balanced, and there maybe a few glitches and bugs but it doesn't really ruined the game but makes it even better because it's hilarious. 10/10 best game to keep playing without getting bored because every game is different than the others.
